message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this incredible product that's worth a lot to me. I'm offering it to you for $18000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer you've made. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only pay $15000. Let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $15000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $16500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
Thanks for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay $16000 for it. Let me know if this works for you.
